column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh: An accident------ took place at 10:30 pm on November 12
column5: along Street 261 in Teuk Laak I commune
column8: was being driven by a man
column10: when it hit a man who was walking across the road.------An ambulance took the victim to hospital. After the accident
column11: the vehicle owner went to the hospital to see the victim.------Local authorities allowed the two sides to reconcile without the law getting involved
column12: with a compensation of $150 to the victim resolving the matter.------https://www.postnews.com.kh/local/386447------
